title: Seldarine Drow

nce, regained on a long rest, and charisma is their spellcasting ability for this spell. Darkness: Create a cloud of magical darkness to Heavily Obscure and Blind creatures within. Creatures cannot make ranged attacks into or out of the darkness. Drow gain access to this spell at level 5. They can cast it once, regained on a long rest, and charisma is their spellcasting ability for this spell.
